requestParams.name: price
requestParams.desc: 价格;单位元,精确到小数后2位

requestParams.name: sku_id
requestParams.desc: 规格ID,无规格商品不用填写

requestParams.name: special_weeks
requestParams.desc: 一段时间内指定某几天设置,不填写默认全设置，多个逗号分隔；周一:1,周二:2,周三:3,周四:4,周五:5,周六:6,周日:7

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['stock_num']=12
params['status']=1
params['special_weeks']="1,2,3,4,5,6,7"
params['sku_id']=36144305
params['price']="235"
params['item_id']=332589771
params['end_date']="2018-08-29"
params['begin_date']="2018-08-28"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.item.hotel.room.set', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'12', 'status' => '1', 'special_weeks' => '1,2,3,4,5,6,7', 'sku_id' => '36144305', 'price' => '235', 'item_id' => '332589771', 'end_date' => '2018-08-29', 'begin_date' => '2018-08-28', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';
